tweet.text: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S.-European relations? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications accepted from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/mMoopm03xN
